title: Grateful Dead Live at Nassau Veterans Memorial Coliseum on 1981-05-06
lineage: Master Cassettes (Nakamichi DR-1)> Tascam DA-3000 (DSF 1-bit/5.6 MHz) > dBpoweramp 24/96 > Adobe Audition CC 2019 > TLH flac2496
source: Mark Severson's Master  Audience Cassettes; (3) x Nakamichi 700 mics (left/right cardioids, omni center - on a handheld pole 30' from stage in the penalty box)> Custom mixer by Jamie Poris > Sony TC-D5M (Maxell MX)
